job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Build from the ground up : Develop new features and products from scratch, working across frontend and backend to create seamless, reactive user experiences. You'll bring your ideas and those of your team to life, designing and implementing services that propel our platform forward.
     * Frontend & Backend development : Work across the stack, focusing on frontend frameworks (React) and backend services (Python). Design scalable APIs and craft intuitive user interfaces while implementing WebSocket functionality to deliver real-time, reactive user experiences.
     * Pixel-perfect execution : Collaborate closely with designers to bring wireframes and prototypes to life with precision. You'll ensure that our applications not only function smoothly but also align with design specifications for a polished, professional look.
     * Collaborate on architecture : Help scale our architecture with cloud-based services, REST APIs, and logging frameworks, ensuring high performance and reliability as we grow.
     * Collaborate on technical roadmaps : Work closely with the CTO and other engineers to design the technical roadmap and shape the future of our product ecosystem, driving decisions that impact our tech stack and infrastructure.
     * Feature ownership : Take end-to-end ownership of features, from concept through deployment, ensuring our applications are secure, reliable, and aligned with best practices.

   Tech Stack You'll Be Working With :
     * Cloud platforms and deployment tools
     * FastAPI, React
     * Database technologies (e.g., PostgreSQL, Redis)
     * LLM providers
     * Monitoring and CI / CD tools (e.g., GitHub Actions, CodeCov)
     * REST APIs, Webhooks, WebSockets
job_details.full_text:
Full Stack Engineer

* Build from the ground up : Develop new features and products from scratch, working across frontend and backend to create seamless, reactive user experiences. You'll bring your ideas and those of your team to life, designing and implementing services that propel our platform forward.
     * Frontend & Backend development : Work across the stack, focusing on frontend frameworks (React) and backend services (Python). Design scalable APIs and craft intuitive user interfaces while implementing WebSocket functionality to deliver real-time, reactive user experiences.
     * Pixel-perfect execution : Collaborate closely with designers to bring wireframes and prototypes to life with precision. You'll ensure that our applications not only function smoothly but also align with design specifications for a polished, professional look.
     * Collaborate on architecture : Help scale our architecture with cloud-based services, REST APIs, and logging frameworks, ensuring high performance and reliability as we grow.
     * Collaborate on technical roadmaps : Work closely with the CTO and other engineers to design the technical roadmap and shape the future of our product ecosystem, driving decisions that impact our tech stack and infrastructure.
     * Feature ownership : Take end-to-end ownership of features, from concept through deployment, ensuring our applications are secure, reliable, and aligned with best practices.

   Tech Stack You'll Be Working With :
     * Cloud platforms and deployment tools
     * FastAPI, React
     * Database technologies (e.g., PostgreSQL, Redis)
     * LLM providers
     * Monitoring and CI / CD tools (e.g., GitHub Actions, CodeCov)
     * REST APIs, Webhooks, WebSockets

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on full-stack development with a strong emphasis on traditional software engineering tasks like frontend and backend development, API design, and database management. While it mentions 'LLM providers' and 'Cloud platforms and deployment tools', it lacks specific details about generative AI model development, fine-tuning, RAG systems, or advanced prompt engineering, which are core to the GenAI Engineer profile. The role appears to be a general software engineering position that might *integrate* with AI services rather than developing them.

job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes building features and products from scratch, working across frontend and backend, designing scalable APIs, crafting user interfaces, and implementing WebSocket functionality, all of which are core software development activities.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop new features and products from scratch, working across frontend and backend to create seamless, reactive user experiences.

job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions working across the stack, focusing on frontend frameworks (React) and backend services (Python), designing APIs, and implementing real-time features.
job_tasks.phrase: Work across the stack, focusing on frontend frameworks (React) and backend services (Python). Design scalable APIs and craft intuitive user interfaces while implementing WebSocket functionality to deliver real-time, reactive user experiences.

job_tasks.justification: Describes collaborating with designers to implement wireframes and prototypes with precision, ensuring functional and visually aligned applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate closely with designers to bring wireframes and prototypes to life with precision.

job_tasks.justification: Involves scaling architecture with cloud services, REST APIs, and logging frameworks, which are integral to building robust backend systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Help scale our architecture with cloud-based services, REST APIs, and logging frameworks, ensuring high performance and reliability as we grow.

job_tasks.justification: Highlights working with the CTO and other engineers to design the technical roadmap and shape the product ecosystem, indicating involvement in strategic technical decisions.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate on technical roadmaps : Work closely with the CTO and other engineers to design the technical roadmap and shape the future of our product ecosystem, driving decisions that impact our tech stack and infrastructure.

job_tasks.justification: Refers to taking full responsibility for features from concept to deployment, ensuring security, reliability, and adherence to best practices, which is a key aspect of software development lifecycle management.
job_tasks.phrase: Take end-to-end ownership of features, from concept through deployment, ensuring our applications are secure, reliable, and aligned with best practices.
